dict.acceptation: 答复； 解答； 答辩；适应；
回答；答案；反应；足以媲美的人；

sent.orig: The speaker said he would confine himself to (try) to (answer) for questions.
sent.trans: trying,answer.又来了哦~~第一个to是介词，第二个to是不定式。

sent.orig: I will reply you and give you a better answer. 2.
sent.trans: 我会回答你，及毒品调查科藻；给你一个更好的answer.2。

sent.orig: Answer the questions about the poem. Give short answer.
sent.trans: 回答关于这首诗的问题。并作简短回答。

sent.orig: The paper discusses the two types the rhetorical: explicit question ambiguous answer and question without answer.
sent.trans: 本文讨论设问的两种特殊类型：实问虚答与只问不答。

sent.orig: And so a short answer is often spoken of as a laconic answer.
sent.trans: 因此简洁的回答通常被称为拉科人的回答。
